thank you, works like a charm :)

all you have to do when the torrent is downloaded :

1. put the assasinscreed folder in to this path - sdcard/gameloft/games
2. copy the Assassins Creed.apk file onto sd card
3. turn off wifi and data connection
4. open ES file explorer or App Installer, tap on Assassins Creed instalation
5. launch the game
6. programm needs to download additional data - when this appear, tap Yes, then tap WiFi or DataConnection (in the game) and download the data
7. play the game
Works great on Samsung Galaxy S using Android 2.2!

Works on my Galaxy Tab! If any of the tips don't work, follow this step:
1. Turn off data connection and wi-fi.
2. Run the game.
3. When it asks you to download, minimize the game and turn on data connection or wi-fi and return to game.
4. Press yes and it will download.
5. After it has finished downloading, turn off wi-fi or data connection and play the game...! :)
